cache-notfound-responses.help: Enable/disable response from the DNS server when a record is not in cache.
cache-notfound-responses.name: cache-notfound-responses

options.help: Disable cache NOTFOUND responses from DNS server.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable cache NOTFOUND responses from DNS server.
options.name: enable

dns-cache-limit.help: Maximum number of records in the DNS cache.
dns-cache-limit.name: dns-cache-limit

dns-cache-ttl.help: Duration in seconds that the DNS cache retains information.
dns-cache-ttl.name: dns-cache-ttl

options.help: Use TLS for DNS queries if TLS is available.
options.name: enable

options.help: Use only TLS for DNS queries. Does not fall back to unencrypted DNS queries if TLS is unavailable.
options.name: enforce

domain.help: DNS search domain list separated by space (maximum 8 domains).
domain.name: domain

domain.help: Search suffix list for hostname lookup.
domain.name: domain

interface.help: Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface.name: interface

interface-select-method.help: Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-method.name: interface-select-method

options.help: Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
options.name: sdwan

hostname.help: DNS server host name list separated by space (maximum 4 domains).
hostname.name: hostname

source-ip.help: IP address used by the DNS server as its source IP.
source-ip.name: source-ip

ssl-certificate.help: Name of local certificate for SSL connections.
ssl-certificate.name: ssl-certificate

timeout.help: DNS query timeout interval in seconds (1 - 10).
timeout.name: timeout
